nodes.text: This mobile indoctrination center was used by the Rakata Infinite Empire.
The vessel was similar to other Rakatan designs, with a superstructure where the top "prong" was shorter than the other two and all three had a smaller "prong"-like structure next to the main ones.

The vessel was seen in a vision of the past, where it appeared to serve as the indoctrination center for Xesh and other Force Hounds. Lines of tubes were stacked inside the craft, where Xesh was seen inside of one with wires and sensors covering his head.
